data.title: Apple iPad - iPadOS Software Updates
data.meta_description: Learn about the latest iPadOS updates for all iPads, including performance improvements, enhancements and major operating system updates.
data.text:
Release date: 07/29/2024

What's changing:

iPadOS 16.7.9 is now available from Apple. iPadOS 16.7.9 includes important security updates recommended for everyone.

Learn about all the benefits of iPadOS 16.7.9 on Apple's website.

Click your device name below for additional Support information.

Impacted devices:**

iPad (9.7-inch) (5th Gen)

iPad Pro (9.7-inch)

Release date: 07/29/2024

What's changing:

iPadOS 15.8.3 is now available from Apple. iPadOS 15.8.3 includes important security updates recommended for everyone.

Learn about all the benefits of iPadOS 15.83 on Apple's website.

Click your device name below for additional Support information.

Impacted devices:

iPad Air 2

iPad mini 4

Release date: 01/24/2023

What's changing:

iPadOS 12.5.7 is now available from Apple. iPadOS 12.5.7 provides important security updates, recommended for all users.

Learn about all the benefits of iPadOS 12.5.7 on Apple's website.

Click your device name below for additional Support information.

Impacted devices:

iPad Air

iPad mini

iPad mini 3
